entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-11-23
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • The runtime can't load some types with mutual references. #78781
  • CI build failure: Build MacCatalyst x64 Release AllSubsets_Mono - XcodeBuildApp task failed unexpectedly - Could not find System.Runtime.Tests.app #78778
  • CI failure: System.IO.Pipes.Tests.NamedPipeTest_Specific.ClientConnectAsync_Cancel_With_InfiniteTimeout - The operation has timed out. #78777
  • [feature request]: system.text.json JsonExtensionData support for internal and private/protected #78775
  • [System.Threading.Tasks.Dataflow] Dataflow unreliably completes before processing all items #78772
  • Positional record cannot handle in-memory array configuration #78771
    Future
  • [API Proposal]: Allow Lazy<T> to be invalidated #78770
  • Should `IDictionary<K, V>` return something that implements `IReadOnlySet<K>`? #78762
  • Fatal error. Internal CLR error. (0x80131506) or unexpected NullReferenceException in XElement.Attribute(XName) #78759
    8.0.0
  • Runtime_76194 fails on ARM32 #78758
  • [API Proposal]: add direct buffer access to SocketAddress #78757
  • Wrong version for System.Text.Json in nuget package? #78754
  • [API Proposal]: Support specifying global degree of parallelism for Parallel.ForEachAsync by providing a ConcurrencyLimiter #78753
  • Resolve workaround for linker 1541 main assembly rooting behavior in AOT compiler #78752
    8.0.0
  • `QuicConnection.ConnectAsync` raises `SocketException` when host not found #78751
    8.0.0
  • [wasm] extract JSImport initialization to separate method #78750
    8.0.0
  • Loongarch add option to disable building Crossgen2 #78749
  • Why don't `DateTime` and `TimeSpan` implement the new "numeric" interfaces in C# 11/.NET 7? #78740

Closed

  • [NativeAOT] Decorating functions with UnmanagedCallersOnlyAttribute does not export them for executables #78663
    Future
  • ExcludeFromCodeCoverageAttribute should have Justification property #29968
    Future
  • Handle returned GetMainProgramHandle() not sufficient for resolving statically linked native symbols on iOS #77985
    8.0.0
  • DataTable, the result of the `new` operator is checked for `null` #78684
    8.0.0
  • Deserialization of a SortedSet works incorrectly after publishing Blazor webassembly #78776
  • Central event fired when a debugging breakpoint is hit and process pauses #78659
  • TarReader doesn't read paths with spaces from Pax extended attributes #78456
  • String support in EnumerableTryGetNonEnumeratedCount and Enumerable.Count #78317
    Future
  • Sockets.ReceiveFrom should use recvfrom? #26867
    Future
  • AccessViolation when calling rejitted method #77973
    8.0.0
  • [mono][llvm] finalizearray.dll fails with LLVM AOT + JIT #54113
    8.0.0
  • [wasm] `Guid.NewGuid()` fails with `Error occurred during a cryptographic operation.` in `Interop.GetCryptographicallySecureRandomBytes(Byte* buffer, Int32 length)` with `node < 19.x` #77927
    8.0.0
  • Unable to assign values to struct properties #68316
    Future
  • Constant propagation should preserve field sequences #64876
    8.0.0
  • System.Text.Json.JsonSerializer.Serialize, when JsonIgnoreAttribute and "required" used together, throw exception #78443
  • Set-AzKeyVaultSecret Socket Exception and timeout #77374
  • FileNameStar_NeedsEncoding_EncodedAndDecodedCorrectly test is failing in CI #78718
    8.0.0
  • KB5011048 breaks PowerShell in Windows Sandboxes #77681

PullRequests

Created

  • Add support for serializing properties in interface hierarchies #78788
    enhancement, area-System.Text.Json, 8.0.0
  • [PERF] Make mono dotnet pathing dynamic with proj file #78787
    area-Infrastructure
  • fuse < and > with = when applicable #78786
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [release/7.0] Tar: Remove invalidation of whitespace in PAX extended attributes #78785
    area-System.Formats.Tar, 7.0.2
  • [Mono] Fix Vector128 divide by scalar #78784
    area-Codegen-LLVM-mono
  • JIT: Fold const RVA access (via const index) #78783
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Wasm jiterpreter cleanup and bug fixes pt. 3 #78782
    arch-wasm, area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • [release/7.0] Allow interop resolvers to return self handle #78779
    Servicing-approved, area-VM-meta-mono, 7.0.x
  • [draft][wasm] Smoke tests for node on runtime pipeline #78769
    arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure-mono, 8.0.0
  • [release/7.0] [wasm] Use "node:crypto" to polyfill getRandomValues on older node #78766
    Servicing-consider, arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 7.0.x
  • Fix asserts in Vector<> #78765
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [release/7.0] [wasm] propagate aborted startup to top most promise #78764
    Servicing-consider, area-VM-meta-mono, 7.0.2
  • Fix Runtime_76194 test #78760
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • This fixes Github issue 78206 - a heap corruption problem associated with mark stack overflow #78756
    area-GC-coreclr
  • [wasm] Add warning code to all warnings produced in WasmAppBuilder #78755
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, 8.0.0
  • Place dispatch cells in dehydrated section #78748
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • fix Socket outerloop tests #78747
    area-System.Net.Sockets
  • Aging dependent handles #78746
    area-GC-coreclr
  • [Merge-on-Red] - Implement Test Process Watcher #78742
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, 8.0.0

Merged

  • Use Environment.IsPrivilegedProcess #77847
    area-Meta, community-contribution
  • NativeAOT exports marked functions for exe apps. #78738
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Allow interop resolvers to return self handle #78004
    area-AssemblyLoader-mono, community-contribution
  • Remove code for CoreFxNetCloudService classic Azure Cloud Service #78773
  • Remove unnecessary null check in DataTable #78725
    area-System.Data
  • Introduce System.IO.Ports area #78743
    area-Meta, 8.0.0
  • Fix the tiering delay to account for changing IL/native code versions during the delay #78668
    area-TieredCompilation-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • Remove members on `arguments_t` that are not related to the app itself #78745
    area-Host
  • Bump System.Data.SqlClient to 4.8.5 #78774
  • Convert some instances of Unsafe.SizeOf and Unsafe.As to regular unsafe code #78741
  • Explicitly omit RID from crossgen2 binary path #78733
    area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • [release/7.0] Explicitly omit RID from crossgen2 binary path #78735
    Servicing-approved, area-crossgen2-coreclr, 7.0.x
  • [release/7.0] Fix netfx build for S.S.C.Xml nuget package #78734
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure-libraries, 7.0.x
  • Use ASCII strings in source files #78265
    area-Meta, community-contribution
  • Tar: Extra tests to confirm extra long paths are not treated as duplicate entries when the full path is in the extended attributes #78744
    area-System.Formats.Tar
  • [wasm] More jiterpreter cleanup #78519
    arch-wasm, area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • fix DualMode ReceiveFrom on macOS #78261
    area-System.Net.Sockets, os-mac-os-x
  • Reenable a test after 78358 is fixed. #78697
    area-System.Xml
  • JIT: Ignore source indir when checking interference for block store source address #78763
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [release/7.0] Don't bind against non-shipping contract assemblies #78730
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, 7.0.x
  • [wasm] Use "node:crypto" to polyfill getRandomValues on older node #78696
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 8.0.0
  • JIT: Keep FieldSeq in AssertionDesc #78616
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Update NugetPackagingVersion to 6.2.2 #78720
  • Anonymous pipe resource leak when DisposeLocalCopyOfClientHandle is not called #78562
    area-System.IO, breaking-change, 8.0.0
  • Improve IndexOfAnyAsciiSearcher ARM throughput #78739
    area-System.Memory, tenet-performance, 8.0.0
  • Use IndexOfAnyValues in Xml #78664
    area-System.Xml, 8.0.0
  • Extend preinitialization interpreter to support calling `string::Length` #78680
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Use IndexOfAnyValues in Uri #78666
    area-System.Net, 8.0.0

Updated

  • Implement a heuristic for using fast-path serialization in streaming JsonSerializer methods. #78646
    area-System.Text.Json, tenet-performance, 8.0.0
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 679: Build ID 2052189 #78677
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, linkable-framework
  • [6.0] Fix the tiering delay to account for changing IL/native code versions during the delay #78670
    Servicing-consider, area-TieredCompilation-coreclr, 6.0.x
  • [7.0] Fix the tiering delay to account for changing IL/native code versions during the delay #78669
    Servicing-consider, area-TieredCompilation-coreclr, 7.0.x
  • Adding new ReadyToRun helper for static cctor #76898
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [release/7.0] Update a few dependencies #78710
  • JIT: Set GTF_ORDER_SIDEEFF for some nodes with invisible dependencies #78698
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [Release/7.0][PERF]Fix Mono Dotnet Generation #78413
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Add compiler-generated code tests for NativeAot #77457
    area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • Adding the Vector512 and Vector512<T> types #76642
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, new-api-needs-documentation, arch-avx512
  • [wasm] bump devDependencies to rollup 3 and TypeScript 4.9 #78726
    area-Build-mono
  • [release/7.0] [mono][wasm] Disable AOTing methods which contain catch clauses insid… #78732
    Servicing-consider, area-Codegen-JIT-mono, 7.0.2
  • [release/7.0] Fix DiagnosticSource to work with NativeAOT #78532
    area-System.Diagnostics.Tracing, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Improve XmlSerializationWriter.WriteTypedPrimitive #76436
    area-Serialization, community-contribution
  • ArgOutOfRangeException throw helpers #78222
    area-System.Runtime, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Correctly handle false on Add/Take from underlying collection in BlockingCollection #77936
    area-System.Collections, community-contribution
  • Bigger workitem timeout (for perf slow pipeline) #78632
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Move the `[With|Get]Element(SIMD)` folding to local morph #76491
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [Release/6.0][PERF] Fix perf repo branch setup target, tool build, and mono-dotnet create #78411
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure-coreclr, 7.0.2
  • Replacing exception strings with those stored in the resx file (#34056) #78341
    area-CoreLib-mono, community-contribution, 8.0.0
  • [wasi][draft] build WASI #77823
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure-mono, 8.0.0
  • [release/7.0] Fix commit accounting for large pages #78564
    Servicing-approved, area-GC-coreclr, 7.0.2
  • [wasm][debugger] Revert don't need to escape special characters anymore #78320
    area-Debugger-mono
  • [wasm] Improve controlling which scenarios test libraries should be run against #78495
    arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure-mono
  • [wasm][debugger] Improvements in debugging in async methods #78651
    area-Debugger-mono
  • [Android] Improvements to remote certificate verification in SslStream #77386
    area-System.Net.Security, os-android, 8.0.0
  • Replace successive "ldr" and "str" instructions with "ldp" and "stp" #77540
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [wasm][libs] Fix `WasmAppHost`, and `AppBundle` for library tests #77719
    arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Remove mono specific SpanHelpers #78015
    area-System.Memory, tenet-performance, area-Codegen-JIT-mono, 8.0.0
  • Subject src-gen serializer to full number-handling tests #78010
    area-System.Text.Json, 8.0.0
  • [NativeAOT] Objective-C Marshal: object tracker support #78280
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Allow inlining for ldsfld + value-type #78736
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Rewrite Enum and add {ISpanFormattable}.TryFormat #78580
    new-api-needs-documentation

entry.title: dotnet/runtimelab - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-11-23
entry.content:
PullRequests

Updated

  • [NativeAOT-LLVM] Support some throwing operators via throw helper blocks #2100

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-11-23
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Adjust `CommonTemplatesTests` to net8 changes in templates #29197
  • Enable C# language version 12 in `CommonTemplatesTests` #29195
  • "CreateAppHost" task failed unexpectedly #29188
  • Installing .net 7 on 20.04 should give error instead of silently install and not worked. #29184

Closed

  • Miscellaneous .NET 7 work #22362
    7.0.1xx
  • Make separate previews/RCs separate bands for workloads #22150
    7.0.1xx
  • Update template metadata for net8.0 #29059
  • C# 11.0 Language Support for .NET 6? #29187
  • [release/7.0.2xx] Runtime fails to generate native System.Private.CoreLib in source-build bootstrap #29177

PullRequests

Created

  • Improve build stability by ensuring we aren't double publishing everywhere #29182
    Area-Infrastructure

Merged

  • 8.0 template packages #27486
    Area-Common templates
  • Introduce MSBuild task frontend for the Roslyn-based GenAPI #29146
    Area-GenAPI

Updated

  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 140: Build ID 2052141 #28957
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Update the target framework for the desktop test projects #28932
    Area-Infrastructure
  • 'dotnet configure add' command for adding new config to a solution file #29139
  • dotnet tool install skip unlisted version #28951
  • Make `dotnet publish` use `Release` by default in 8.0+ Projects #29155
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Template verifier adoption in CommonTemplateTests #28707
    Area-dotnet new, Area-Common templates
  • Merge branch 'release/7.0.2xx' => 'main' #29158
    Area-dotnet new
  • Don't Infer RID outside of dotnet publish for PublishSingleFile/PublishAot #29031
    area-runtime, Area-CLI, Area-SingleFile, Area-NativeAOT
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.1xx' => 'release/6.0.3xx' #29132
    Area-Infrastructure

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-11-23
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • TextDocument.Folders is always empty for additional files #65589
  • Side effects of implicit Range indexer on a struct type are not propagated to the receiver #65586
  • Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.NetAnalyzers warns that I should be using version 7.0.0; but there isn't a release version of 7.0.0 yet #65581
  • `SyntaxTree.GetChanges()` returns non-deterministic results #65580
  • `dotnet_style_prefer_is_null_check_over_reference_equality_method` not respected by other features #65577

Closed

  • BadImageFormatException with virtual static interface properties #65584
  • CA1822 on implicit implementation of a static interface member #65585
  • [Automated] PRs inserted in VS build main-33122.497 #65578
  • VerifyAllCodeStyleFixersAreSupportedByCodeCleanup tests are failing #65566
    17.5
  • Debug-only test failures in ExternalDiagnosticUpdateSourceTests #65563

PullRequests

Created

  • Implement a new brokered service for passing project information #65592
    Area-IDE
  • Move IDS_FeatureXXX checks out of the parser #65587
    Area-Compilers
  • Add capability to request fine grained DiagnosticKinds to diagnostic analyzer service #65583
    Area-Analyzers
  • Allow optional and `params` parameters in synthesized delegate templates #65582
    Area-Compilers
  • Consider delegate default parameter values and `params` in symbol matcher #65579
    Area-Compilers
  • Port #65083 to release/dev17.4 branch #65576
    Area-Analyzers, OnDeckForServicing

Merged

  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #65569
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Compress indices before storing in persistence service #65588
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Prevent null ref in package disposal #65590
    Area-IDE, Next
  • More tests for an issue around constrained calls #65526
    Area-Compilers, Next
  • Add asserts for debug only test failures and fix tests #65565
    Test, Tenet-Reliability, Next
  • Move to multi-column primary keys for our sqlite database. #65553
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Make sure the container syntax node is not GlobalStatements #65570
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Increase CodeCleanUp test value #65575
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Update to latest version of protocol with new pull diagnostic types #65514
    Area-IDE, Next

Updated

  • View Call Hierarchy - fix thread block (#65452) #65574
    Area-IDE
  • Move IDS_FeatureXXX checks out of the parser #65500
    Area-Compilers
  • Revert "Merge pull request #63858 from CyrusNajmabadi/pullDiags" #65538
    Area-IDE, OnDeckForServicing
  • Only complete () if constructor is accessible #65542
    Area-IDE
  • Fix stale inline diagnostics #65571
    Area-IDE
  • Support fine-grained diagnostic tagging. #65547
    Area-IDE
  • Emit `ParamArrayAttribute` for synthesized delegates #65533
    Area-Compilers
  • Add lambda defaults/`params` tests from the test plan review #65458
    Area-Compilers
  • Out arguments do not contribute val escape #64784
    Area-Compilers

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-11-23
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Is there a way to increase the time to refresh the authentication state if RevalidatingIdentityAuthenticationStateProvider is being used? #45245

Closed

  • In ASP.NET 7, IEnumerable<> controller parameters do not bind from request body by default #45162
    7.0.1
  • HTTP/3: React to QuicError.AlpnInUse #43818
    .NET 8 Planning
  • HTTP/3: Report address in use when multiple HTTP/3 listeners in the same process #43061
    .NET 8 Planning
  • Renenable .tt generated code for RequestHeaders.Generated.tt #5869
    8.0-preview1
  • Hot reloading seems to mess up endpoint routing #41177
    .NET 8 Planning
  • Viewing the entire list of registered middleware for the ASP.NET pipeline #43871
    Discussions
  • Produces<string>() should default to "text/plain" rather than "application/json" #43979
    Discussions
  • Support for pagination #44008
    Discussions
  • Blazor Wasm SubDomain Routing #44089
    Discussions
  • Make StaticFileOptions.OnPrepareResponse async #44932
    8.0-preview1
  • Strongly typed child component parameters #29379
    .NET 8 Planning
  • .net 6 aspnet minimal api not using the System.Text.Json source generator? #45064
  • When running a core hosted blazor wasm solution on linux in anything other than Development environment results in 404 on all requests #45249
  • [Templates] Update our testing approach for our E2E templates #30104
    .NET 8 Planning
  • Blazor WASM: Can't pass WebAuthn PublicKeyCredential from JS to .NET #45236
    Discussions
  • [Blazor] ::deep does not work in combination with [dir="rtl"] #45138
    Discussions
  • Enable customization of responce_type for OAuth Authentication #45207
  • Enable http/3 from docker containers #45021

PullRequests

Created

  • [release/7.0] Infer parameter source from ElementType for IEnumerable #45256
  • Fix AzDO area path for policy violations reporting #45255
    area-infrastructure
  • Improved Bot Response for investigation issue #45254
    area-infrastructure
  • [Hosting] Add {OriginalFormat} to start & stop log state objects #45253
    area-runtime, community-contribution
  • Reimplement the default object pool for improved performance #45251
    Perf, community-contribution

Merged

  • Infer parameter source from ElementType for IEnumerable #45173
    area-web-frameworks, 8.0-preview1
  • HTTP/3: Throw AddressInUseException for used port in the same process #45144
    area-runtime, 8.0-preview1
  • Enable TT generation in VS, update SLNF #45250
    area-runtime, 8.0-preview1
  • Add OnPrepareResponseAsync #45062
    area-runtime, community-contribution, 8.0-preview1
  • Fix NonceCookie/CorrelationCookie #45247
    area-security, community-contribution, 8.0-preview1
  • Add support for comment syntax to route detector #45185
    area-infrastructure, area-web-frameworks, 8.0-preview1

Updated

  • Add transport selector interface to Kestrel sockets and QUIC transports #44832
    area-runtime
  • Enable `UsePkce` by default for Google and Facebook auth #45235
    area-security, community-contribution
  • Update selenium dependency versions #44834
  • Add analyzer and code fix to recommend against IHeaderDictionary.Add #44463
    area-runtime, community-contribution
  • HttpSys request headers Keys and Count both allocate #45156
    Perf, area-runtime, servers-httpsys, community-contribution
  • Fix for W3C cookie logging #45226
    area-runtime, community-contribution
  • Fix CookieHeaderParserShared throws exception when last cookie contains invalid character #45014 #45127
    area-runtime, community-contribution
  • Add DateOnly and TimeOnly to MVC Model Binding #45243
    area-web-frameworks
  • [release/7.0] Fix response code description in Minimal APIs #45244
    Servicing-consider, area-web-frameworks
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 1159: Build ID 2051956 #44686
    area-infrastructure
  • Add attributes to SignalR source generator #38025
    area-signalr
  • Complete inner Pipewriter in HttpLoggingMiddleware #39989
    area-runtime
  • Input components two way binding + InputBase handling of unparsable inputs #40326
    area-blazor, community-contribution, .NET 8 Planning
  • feat : Add `StringSyntax` for regex parameters #40589
    area-mvc, community-contribution
  • Update CODEOWNERS #40664
    area-infrastructure
  • [release/2.1] Turn on Component Governance #40885
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, 2.1.x
  • Add IgnoreQueryString parameter to NavLink #40990
    area-blazor, community-contribution
  • JSON "null" request body rejected as an empty request body #41002
    community-contribution, area-web-frameworks
  • Add option to not cache assembly references in runtime razor compilation #41086
    area-mvc, community-contribution
  • Fix flaky HTTP/2 test #41181
    area-runtime
  • Resume the IIS state machine on the thread pool #41271
    Perf, area-runtime
  • Add FieldIdentifier Indexer handling #41628
    area-blazor, community-contribution
  • CreatedResult should accept null location #42576
    community-contribution, area-web-frameworks
  • Simplify and optimize async parameters in RequestDelegateFactory #42588
    area-runtime
  • Introduce per-HealthCheckRegistration parameters #42646
    community-contribution, area-web-frameworks
  • Remove 'max-age' in 'Cache-Control' Response Header when Location is None ('no-cache'). #42706
    community-contribution, area-web-frameworks
  • Cleanup Mvc Analyzers #42754
    community-contribution, area-web-frameworks
  • Guard against httpcontext disconnect race #42838
    area-runtime
  • Fix the IsKnownImmutableType method to return true for enum types #42901
    area-blazor, community-contribution
  • Remove use of Expression.Constant in RequestDelegateFactory #43380
    Perf, area-runtime
  • [SignalR] [Java] Log 'WebSocket stopped' once #43532
    area-signalr, signalr-client-java
  • Update SpaProxy.cs #43663
    area-mvc, feature-spa, community-contribution
  • Improve pfx support for CertificateConfigLoader #43719
    area-runtime
  • [Blazor WebAssembly] Change web app manifest extension to “webmanifest” #43756
    area-mvc, community-contribution
  • Update tests to reflect change of web app manifest extension in React C# template #43765
    area-mvc, community-contribution
  • [Blazor] [WebView] Avoid Base64 encoding because Json Serializer should do that #43923
    area-blazor, community-contribution
  • Add CssClass property to ValidationSummary #43928
    area-blazor, community-contribution
  • [Blazor wasm] Use provided loadBootResource function to override how config is loaded #43969
    area-blazor, community-contribution
  • `IsCharWhitespace` for HTML5 spec without char[].IndexOf #44004
    area-mvc, community-contribution
  • StringUtilities with xplat-intrinsics (and a little perf-tuning) #44040
    area-runtime, community-contribution
  • Update documentation for default CookieBuilder options #44290
    Docs, area-security
  • Add warning on FallbackHref property #44307
    area-mvc, community-contribution
  • Improve IFormCollection.Items documentation #44372
    area-runtime
  • [blazor][wasm] load .js and .wasm assets by runtime #43049
    area-blazor, blazor-wasm, arch-wasm
  • Spa proxy enhancements #45232
    area-runtime
  • Clarify some comments on RateLimiterOptionsExtensions #44855
    area-runtime
  • Route tooling: Support component routes #44656
    area-infrastructure, area-blazor

entry.title: dotnet/diagnostics - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-11-23
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • dotnet diagnostics tools unable to work with 6.0.11 runtime #3520

PullRequests

Updated

  • Add service manager and reflection based service discovery #3448
  • [Dotnet Monitor] Add Metadata Support For `CounterPayload` #3498

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-11-23
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Very slow Intellisense & Code Completion in MAUI projects #11592
  • Performance issue related to Maui Styles #11586
    Backlog
  • Application targetting .NET 6 and Windows 10.0.22621.0 cannot be run #11585
  • Mac Catalyst target cannot be removed #11584
  • [iOS] RadioButton with custom Content cannot be selected with VoiceOver #11583
    Backlog
  • Pipeline commands fail with a dependency on maui-tizen #11579
    Backlog
  • [Android] Shadow with clipping not working properly #11578
    Backlog
  • [iOS] Collection view performance problem with "modification operations" of observable collection #11576
    Backlog
  • dotnet test fails when test project targets net6.0-windows10.0.19041 #11575
    Backlog
  • CarouselView Renders Duplicate Data Templates Multiple Times #11571

Closed

  • Overriding CreateFileProvider for BlazorWebView throws exception #8857
    .NET 7 + Servicing
  • Android precompile failed for visualstudio.rpccontracts.dll #11397
  • FilePicker.PickMultipleAsync does not wait and just returns null on Mac #11574
  • iOS map clicked event fires when tap on pin #11532
    Backlog
  • Gradient not loading on iOS #9854
    .NET 7 Planning
  • Gradient not appearing on iOS #8402
    Backlog
  • Frame.Background LinearGradientBrush not working on maccatalyst #8108
    .NET 7 Planning
  • [MacCatalyst] [Scenario Day] Brushes not working in Frame #7261
    .NET 7 Planning
  • no issue #11587
  • Polyline - Fill Not Working on Triangle or Any Shape #9759
    Backlog
  • IImage Resize Cannot access a disposed object - Android #11255
    Backlog
  • Setting IsBusy causes exception/crash #9658
    .NET 7 Planning
  • Setting Page.IsBusy to true is not displaying waiting indicator #8617
  • TalkBack doesn't navigate to headings contained in StackLayout with a SemanticProperties.Description #8524
    .NET 8 Planning
  • [iOS] ImageButton in FlexLayout not clickable #11335
  • WebView on iOS using Navigating event fails with obj exception #11544

PullRequests

Created

  • Only add PG if VSM is added #11591
  • Exclude incompatible files from daily dotnet format workflow #11590
    area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • Ensure no crashing for < iOS 12 due to PointerGesture incompatibility #11589
  • [housekeeping] Automated PR to fix formatting errors #11570
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, do-not-merge, area/infrastructure 🏗️

Merged

  • [iOS] Avoid propagate Map tap event tapping a Pin on iOS #11582
    t/bug, platform/iOS 🍎, area/controls 🎮, control-map
  • Fix Managing Layout Children #11581
    area/layout 🔲, community ✨
  • [Catalyst] Fix brushes in Frame #7925
    t/bug, platform/macOS 🍏, area/drawing ✏️, platform/iOS 🍎, control-frame, .NET 7 Planning
  • Align Shapes Fill property behavior with Xamarin.Forms #10328
    t/bug, area/drawing ✏️
  • [Android] Fix crash using Page IsBusy property #9783
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/controls 🎮
  • [Android] Fix ObjectDisposedException on Android resizing images #11577
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/drawing ✏️
  • Bump autoformatting action to v0.2. #11580

Updated

  • Manual update for .net8 sdk and workloads #11387
    area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • Allow string property binding as Color source #9814
    t/bug, area/Xaml </>
  • Make iOS Label HTML behavior compatible with Forms #11569
    area/controls 🎮
  • [iOS] RadioButton a11y #10832
    area/a11y, area/controls 🎮, control-radiobutton
  • [Windows] Changes in SwipeViewHandler #11229
    t/bug, platform/windows 🪟, area/controls 🎮, control-swipeview
  • Using local function to fix multi-thread issues #11497
    area/drawing ✏️, area/perf 🏎️, community ✨
  • Avoid crash using BoxView visibility (avoid unnecessary parent) #11439
    t/bug, platform/windows 🪟, area/controls 🎮
  • [iOS] Fix issue loading local files in WebView #10804
    t/bug, platform/macOS 🍏, platform/iOS 🍎, area/controls 🎮, control-webview
  • Allow Button.ImageSource to be updated on Android, iOS and macOS #11008
    area/controls 🎮, community ✨
  • [Android] Fix SwipeItemView size issues #10522
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/controls 🎮, control-swipeview
  • Resolve some life cycle issues with `TabbedPage` when nested inside a `NavigationPage` #11530
    area/TabbedPage
  • Update Essentials Compass API Docs #11414
    area/docs 📓, t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/essentials 🍞

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-11-23
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Count after Take throws "No column name was specified for column 1 of 't'." #29667
  • Support for TBT and TBC in ExecuteUpdate(Async) & ExecuteDelete(Async) #29666
  • Multiple Include() warning: false positive for ThenInclude()? #29665
  • Migration for IdentityUser change type of key is failing #29664
  • Json Column With Id property #29663
  • Consider removing reference navigation keys from order by #29662
    Backlog
  • DB ContextPooling no Performance gain #29661
  • Cannot access a disposed context instance. #29660
  • HasDiscriminator based on owned value object property #29659
  • Could not load file or assembly Microsoft.SqlServer.Server #29658
  • How to inject data into a my dbcontext to dynamically configure the database? #29657
  • Entity With 268 Property (Column) Memory Leak in Savechange #29655

Closed

  • CompiledQuery with ExpressionTree #29648
  • Conditional dependent entity? #29604
  • EfCore: How to use override Equals Model Compare #29625
  • Add `dotnet ef database create-tables` command #29629
  • Invalid Dependency in Microsoft.EntityFrameworkCore.Relational #29651
  • Scaffold-DbContext does not produce empty constructor in EF7 anymore #29613
  • DbSet Moq Exception #29598
  • ExecuteUpdate is not committing transactions even if included in an explicit transaction #29578
  • Bi-Temporal Table Support #29577
  • Is there any progress on adding a DTABASE NOW approach at the efcore level #29549
  • Temporal table - TemporalAsOf() - nested children entities on navigation property not loaded #29644

PullRequests

Created

  • Fix to #28648 - Json/Query: translate element access of a json array #29656

Merged

  • Use correct parameter in query based on type mapping #29650
    auto-merge

Updated

  • [release/2.1] Update to SQLitePCLRaw 2.1.2 #29433
